### Publications  


```{r "pubPlot", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, dev.args = list(bg = 'transparent'), aniopts=c(interval = 0.8, loop=1)}
pp = get_citation_history("7NkxgWQAAAAJ") %>% 
  mutate(cumulative=cumsum(cites)) %>% 
  gather(metric, val, -1) %>% 
  mutate(ease = 'cubic-in-out') %>% 
  tween_elements("year", "metric", "ease", nframes = nrow(.)/2) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=val, group=.group, fill=val, color=.group, frame=.frame,  cumulative = TRUE)) + 
  geom_line(lineend="round") + 
  geom_point(show.legend = F) +
  annotate("text",x=-Inf,y=Inf,vjust=1.5,hjust=-0.05,size=3,colour='gray',
           label=format(Sys.time(), "%d-%m-%Y %H:%M %Z")) + #add timestamp for the update
  labs(y="Googe citations", x="Year") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color="#4E67691F"),
        panel.background =  element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(), 
        legend.background = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.key = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(),
        text = element_text(color="#4E6769"),
        line = element_line(color="#4E6769")) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#2c3b3b", "#AD957F"))

#gganimate(pp, title_frame = FALSE)
pp
```


```{r "pubList", results='asis', warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
pubs = get_publications("7NkxgWQAAAAJ") %>% 
  filter(journal != "") %>% 
  mutate(cid     = ifelse(is.na(cid), NA, paste0("https://scholar.google.no/scholar?oi=bibs&hl=en&cluster=", cid))) %>% 
  mutate(author  = gsub("Mowinckel", "**Mowinckel**", author), 
         journal = ifelse(is.na(cid), paste0("_", journal,"_"), paste0("[_", journal,"_](", cid, ")")), 
         number  = paste0("_",number,"_"),
         year    = paste0("(",year,")")) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  transmute(pub=paste(author, year, title, journal, number, collapse="<br><br>")) 
cat(pubs[1,])


```
